stole together, in jail together.

I mean, you know, everyone is free to do
 whatever they want and when they want it.

Uh...
 You hear so much shit in here.

 It's bigger than him. He doesn't know how to hold it.

No, no. Just listen to me. Orders are orders.
 What you have to do is go back to your place.

with the briefcase.

pa:
What should I do?
 First, you shut your mouth.

pa: Release him.

ta sẽ kết án anh ta.

pa: Gandía is a lone wolf.
vi: Với con sói đơn độc ngoài kia,

The door doesn't matter.

Denver.

Split them with Helsinki and Stockholm.

vi: Mọi người rõ nhiệm vụ chưa?

pa:
